title: Lei kum a rei tawh long
lyrics:
Lei kum a rei tawh lo'ng,
Lungkham mangante nen;
Lungngaih ni leh lawm lai ni te,
Tawngtaina hunte nen.

Sual hun a rei tawh lo'ng,
Kan rum lai nite nen;
Lei hlate hi a kin tawh ang,
Dam takin tih nen hian.

Chatuan rama lengin,
Chatuan mipuite nen,
Chatuan ni eng ropuiah chuan,
Chatuan hla kan sa ang.
